title: Hacker Steals Over $690,000 After Hijacking Vitalik Buterin's Twitter Account
description: A fake link promising an exclusive NFT was posted to the Ethereum inventor's feed.

title: Friend.tech regains launch hype momentum as revenue hits $5.6M amid surge in usage
description:
Friend.tech’s revenue hit $5.6 million on Sept. 9, marking a 30-day high for the recently launched blockchain social networking platform, which has regained some of its lost momentum, according to Token Terminal data. The strong revenue is driven by a steady increase in usage over the last two weeks despite a significant fall in the […]

The post Friend.tech regains launch hype momentum as revenue hits $5.6M amid surge in usage appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Ripple token XRP set for a significant price surge, analyst predicts
description: CryptoSea founder Daan de Rover predicts a "gigantic move" for Ripple's XRP. The digital asset saw its price skyrocket on July 13 by over 80%.
